pages.text:
March 2020 County of Marin EMS BLS PR 10
BLOOD GLUCOSE MONITORING
BLS PROCEDURE
Indications
• Patients with ALOC and/or suspected hypoglycemia as indicated by the following symptoms:
• Diabetic history
• Abnormal or combative behavior
• Pale, moist skin
Equipment
• Glucometer
• Lancet
• Test strip
• Alcohol pad
• Gauze pad/bandage
• Turn glucometer on and insert test strip
• Clean fingertip with alcohol pad. Gently
squeeze fingertip to promote blood flow
• Pierce fingertip with lancet
• Apply blood sample to test strip
• Record results
If blood glucose <60 or immeasurable
• Treat patient according to Administration of
Oral Glucose BLS Procedure, BLS PR 3
